scripts.test: npm run test:startdb & npm run test:startsqs; TEST_ENV=true AWS_REGION=us-west-2 WEBHOOK_ENDPOINTS_TABLE=GutenbergTable mocha --recursive --throw-deprecation --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/test/setLogLevelSilent.ts --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb & npm run test:stopsqs
scripts.test:debug: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true AWS_REGION=us-west-2 WEBHOOK_ENDPOINTS_TABLE=GutenbergTable mocha --recursive --throw-deprecation --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/test/setLogLevelDebug.ts --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test:startdb: docker start gutenberg-test-db || (docker run --name gutenberg-test-db -p 8000:8000 amazon/dynamodb-local)
scripts.test:startsqs: docker start gutenberg-test-queue || (docker run --name gutenberg-test-queue -p 9324:9324 softwaremill/elasticmq)
